data.lyric:
[ti:Get Me (feat. Kehlani)]
[ar:Justin Bieber/Kehlani]
[al:Get Me (feat. Kehlani)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Get Me - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)/Kehlani (柯兰尼)
[00:00.31]Lyrics by：Jason "Poo Bear" Boyd/Justin Bieber/Matthew Jehu Samuels/Anderson Hernandez/Jun Ha Kim
[00:00.62]Composed by：Jason "Poo Bear" Boyd/Justin Bieber/Matthew Jehu Samuels/Anderson Hernandez/Jun Ha Kim
[00:00.93]Justin Bieber：
[00:06.37]Ooh you don't compare don't fit in with 'em do you get me
[00:11.52]Judgin' by the way you open up you get me
[00:18.08]Ooh out of this world hands on baby now you see me
[00:23.36]Lookin' at the way we're blendin' in you get me
[00:26.98]Justin Bieber：
[00:28.23]Ha-ha-ha you get me
[00:34.10]Ha-ha-ha you get me
[00:37.27]Justin Bieber：
[00:40.62]See you're lookin' beyond the surface
[00:44.28]Can tell by the questions you're asking
[00:46.79]You got me low-key nervous
[00:49.91]It feels like we're on the same wave yeah
[00:53.17]Never intended to relate I mean what are the chances
[00:58.96]Never thought I'd connect with you not any circumstances
[01:03.01]Justin Bieber：
[01:04.78]Ooh you don't compare don't fit in with 'em do you get me
[01:10.07]Judgin' by the way you open up you get me
[01:16.57]Ooh out of this world hands on baby now you see me
[01:21.89]Lookin' at the way we're blendin' in you get me
[01:25.78]Justin Bieber：
[01:26.74]Ha-ha-ha you get me
[01:32.39]Ha-ha-ha you get me
[01:36.15]Kehlani：
[01:40.14]Ooh there's so much chemistry
[01:41.83]Like you came inside you're finishin' my sentences
[01:44.59]And they're sayin' no we can't deny this energy
[01:47.72]How 'bout reapin' all the benefits yeah
[01:51.51]Never intended to relate I mean what are the chances
[01:57.43]Never thought I'd connect with you not any circumstances no-o-o-oh
[02:03.02]Justin Bieber/Kehlani：
[02:03.50]Ooh you don't compare don't fit in with 'em do you get me
[02:08.59]Judgin' by the way you open up you get me
[02:12.55]Yeah you really get me
[02:14.46]Ooh out of this world hands on baby now you send me
[02:18.65]Ooh that's why you send me
[02:20.42]Lookin' at the way we're blendin' in you get me
[02:24.01]Ooh you really get me
[02:25.07]
[02:25.68]Ha-ha-ha you get me
[02:28.11]Oo-oo-oo-oo-oo-ooh
[02:31.10]Ha-ha-ha you get me
[02:33.29]Ye-e-e-e-e-e-ah
[02:38.43]Oh you get me yeah
[02:41.77]You get me yeah yeah
[02:44.87]You get me yeah
[02:47.60]You get me yeah yeah
data.trans:
力非豆  14:14:24
[ti:Get Me (feat. Kehlani)]
[ar:Justin Bieber/Kehlani]
[al:Get Me (feat. Kehlani)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.31]//
[00:00.62]//
[00:00.93]//
[00:06.37]喔 你无与伦比 如此与众不同 你可知我心意
[00:11.52]由你的言谈即可判断 你知我心意
[00:18.08]实属世间罕有 与你亲密接触 宝贝 此刻我们四目相对
[00:23.36]就这样彼此交融 你知我心意
[00:26.98]//
[00:28.23]你懂我心意
[00:34.10]你懂我心意
[00:37.27]//
[00:40.62]你看问题从不拘泥于表面
[00:44.28]从你提出的质疑就能看出
[00:46.79]优秀睿智的你让我暗自紧张不已
[00:49.91]感觉我们就是默契十足
[00:53.17]从未设想过 我有此荣幸
[00:58.96]任何机缘巧合下 亦从未设想过与你有交集
[01:03.01]//
[01:04.78]喔 你无与伦比 如此与众不同 你可知我心意
[01:10.07]由你的言谈即可判断 你知我心意
[01:16.57]实属世间罕有 与你亲密接触 宝贝 此刻我们四目相对
[01:21.89]就这样彼此交融 你知我心意
[01:25.78]//
[01:26.74]你懂我心意
[01:32.39]你懂我心意
[01:36.15]//
[01:40.14]火花四溅
[01:41.83]你一出现 便令我哑口无言
[01:44.59]人们都说爱情的吸引我们无法抗拒
[01:47.72]何不细细体会这美好
[01:51.51]从未设想过 我有此荣幸
[01:57.43]任何机缘巧合下 亦从未设想过与你有交集
[02:03.02]//
[02:03.50]喔 你无与伦比 如此与众不同 你可知我心意
[02:08.59]由你的言谈即可判断 你知我心意
[02:12.55]你确知我心意
[02:14.46]实属世间罕有 与你亲密接触 宝贝 此刻你令我心驰神往
[02:18.65]你如此令我心驰神往
[02:20.42]就这样彼此交融 你知我心意
[02:24.01]你确知我心意
[02:25.07]
[02:25.68]你知我心意
[02:28.11]//
[02:31.10]你知我心意
[02:33.29]//
[02:38.43]喔 你知我心意
[02:41.77]你知我心意
[02:44.87]你知我心意
[02:47.60]你知我心意
